reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: SAHAS (Strategic Augmentation of HIV AIDS Services)

description.narrative: India - HIV - Department of Economic Affairs, Ministry of Finance of India - DEA-H. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero AIDS-related deaths and zero AIDS related stigma & discrimination. The objectives of this program are: Reduce new infections by 80% by 2024. Ensure 95% of estimated PLHIV know their status by 2024. Ensure ART initiation and retention of 95% PLHIV for sustained viral suppression by 2024. Eliminate mother-to-child transmission of HIV and syphilis by 2020. Eliminate HIV/AIDS related stigma and discrimination by 2020. Facilitate sustainable NACP service delivery by 2024

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for IND-H-NACO
Percentage of health facilities dispensing antiretroviral therapy that experienced a stock-out of at least one required antiretroviral drug in the last 12 month
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
DLI-4: Number of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
DLI-1: Number of people on ART at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive patients who were screened for TB in HIV care or treatment settings
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
DLI-2: Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically supressed
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART, who have a suppressed viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
Percentage of adults and children that initiated ART, with an undetectable viral load at 12 months (<1000 copies/ml)
TCS-other 2: Percentage of key population started on ART, out of total PLHIV from key population detected positive in ICTC centres
DLI-3: Proportion of ‘Sampoorna Surakhsha’ one-stop centers operational against the planned
